name: Selfish Fisherman
description:
"But I wanted to go fishing!"

Poor Lynn, the little 9 year old just wanted to go to the lake and catch some fish. However, there is someone who just won't go away, sitting exactly where she wanted to sit!

Gameplay:

Talk to your neighbours and other people of the town to get information about your new enemy.

Complete requests and follow quests of your neighbours and other people of the town to come closer to your goal.

Can you help Lynn to be able to go fishing, alone?

Controls:

The game can be played with both keyboard and mouse and a gamepad.

Credits:

Sounds are from WeLoveIndies.

Everything else was made by me.
